comment: ` 1 ` is an identity element for real multiplication. Axiom 14 of 22 for real and complex numbers, derived from ZF set theory. Weakened from the original axiom in the form of statement in ~ mulid1 , based on ideas by Eric Schmidt. This construction-dependent theorem should not be referenced directly; instead, use ~ ax-1rid .
